name: Decisions (itch) (Petermulcahy)
description:
This is an early access to one story line for my final major project at university. this game follows a character who is in a coma state world trapped in their own mind by the actions that led them here. explore the demo area to find out what happen to you t land you in this strange place

EDIT## I have just changed the build to one that has less assets and no water, this has reduced the lag on my personal testing but there still may be lag with this build.
